alert.note: Alert for Bullock; Elmore; Macon; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Elmore, northern Bullock, Macon and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 522 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tuskegee National Forest to Montgomery. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Millbrook, Tuskegee, Tallassee, Milstead, Pike Road, Shorter, Franklin, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Auburn University In Montgomery, Lake Tuskegee, Emerald Mountain, Maxwell Air Force Base, Tuskegee National Forest, Davisville, Waugh, Lagoon Park, Liverpool and Alabama State University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
